title: Night's Engines
description: The conclusion of the Night-Bound Land duology. The Roil has not yet been defeated - and the Roil extends its grip on Shale, following the commands of the Dreaming Cities. Wars will be fought. Doomsday weapons employed. And night will fall.File Fantasy [ The World Engines | Darkness Prevails | A Land In Shadow | Final Chance ]e-book 978-0-85766-188-3
author: Trent Jamieson
